data.lyric:
[ti:Escape From LA (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Escape From LA (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:09.99]Lyrics by：Mike McTaggart/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Leland Tyler Wayne
[00:19.98]Composed by：Mike McTaggart/Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Leland Tyler Wayne
[00:29.98]You pillow talk to me about the men who try to get in between us
[00:34.84]They buy you bags and jewelry yeah
[00:38.13]They think your kindness is so weak
[00:41.37]Know you don't give it up so easy baby
[00:45.04]But you just wanted my attention
[00:48.31]You just wanted my affection
[00:51.27]You got me tattooed on your mind
[00:54.87]You just want me all the time
[00:57.77]We'll figure out our s**t and find a way
[01:00.35]Oh yeah
[01:01.22]When you say that you need space I give you space
[01:03.44]You space
[01:04.43]Girl when you're ready you know where I stay
[01:07.68]When it comes to all these h*es I'll never chase
[01:10.98]But this world is such a such an evil place
[01:14.51]Man these h*es will always find a way
[01:17.67]'Cause when I'm on the liquor I go crazy
[01:20.92]And for that p***y you know I'm a slave yeah
[01:25.62]This place is never what it seems
[01:31.33]Take me out LA
[01:34.63]Take me out of LA
[01:38.74]This place will be the end of me
[01:44.48]Take me out LA
[01:47.74]Take me out of LA yeah
[01:51.60]Yeah
[01:53.04]I'm in the Spyder Porsche cruisin' down the street
[01:56.80]Black on black venom colored seats
[02:00.11]Keanu Reeves the way a n***a speed
[02:03.42]Diamond cross hangin' off of me
[02:06.49]I'm fighting for my soul Constantine
[02:09.72]And it's slowly burning it was never cheap
[02:13.02]If you see what I seen you wouldn't sleep
[02:16.36]I can't sleep
[02:17.78]'Cause I got everything I wanted
[02:21.11]Got the money got the cars got the ceiling with the stars
[02:24.54]Got everything I wanted
[02:27.62]But I'd be nothing without you
[02:31.15]Gave you everything you wanted
[02:34.21]Gave you power gave you life gave you space so you can shine
[02:37.64]Gave you everything you wanted
[02:40.92]But none of that matters to you oh-oh
[02:44.63]This place
[02:46.93]This place
[02:47.70]Is never what it seems
[02:50.23]Take me out LA
[02:53.53]Take me out of LA
[02:56.65]Oh out of it woah-oh
[02:58.13]This place will be the end of me
[03:03.43]Take me out LA
[03:06.68]Take me out of LA yeah
[03:10.07]Woah no oh no no
[03:16.66]No no no no no ooh-woah
[03:23.32]Oh-ah no no no no woah-woah
[03:33.25]Oh no oh
[03:35.46]Hold up
[03:51.94]She pulled up to the studio
[03:56.43]Nobody's watching
[03:58.57]She closed the door and then she locked it
[04:01.51]For me for me
[04:05.06]We had s*x in the studio
[04:09.57]Nobody walked in
[04:11.85]I cut my verse and then she popped it
[04:14.67]For me for me
[04:18.15]LA girls all look the same
[04:21.09]I can't recognize
[04:24.50]The same work done on their face
[04:27.65]I don't criticize
[04:30.92]She a coldhearted b***h with no shame
[04:34.31]But her throat too fire
[04:37.43]She got Chrome Hearts hangin' from her neck
[04:40.89]And them s**ts going wild
[04:44.86]When she ride she hold tight
[04:51.39]She gon' ride 'til sweat fall down her spine
[04:58.08]She's all mine for the night
[05:04.52]She's all mine until he calls her line
[05:10.84]She pulled up to the studio
[05:15.39]Nobody's watching
[05:17.54]She closed the door and then she locked it
[05:20.63]For me for me
[05:23.93]We had s*x in the studio
[05:28.11]Nobody walked in
[05:30.76]I cut my verse and then she popped it
[05:33.66]For me for me
[05:38.73]Oh-oh oh-oh
data.trans:
[ti:Escape From LA (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:After Hours (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:09.99]//
[00:19.98]//
[00:29.98]你和我枕边细语 说有些男人想要介入我们之间
[00:34.84]他们给你买包包和首饰
[00:38.13]他们觉得你的善良是一种软弱
[00:41.37]我知道你不会那么轻易放弃 宝贝
[00:45.04]你只想得到我的关心
[00:48.31]你只想得到我的怜爱
[00:51.27]你已经把我印刻在心里
[00:54.87]你一直都只想要我一个人
[00:57.77]我们之间的问题 一定可以解决
[01:00.35]//
[01:01.22]你说你需要空间 我就给你空间
[01:03.44]给你空间
[01:04.43]姑娘 若你准备好了 你知道我在哪里
[01:07.68]其他女人 我完全不想追
[01:10.98]但这世界是如此邪恶的地方
[01:14.51]这些女人总能破除我的防备
[01:17.67]因为当我醉酒后 我就变得很疯狂
[01:20.92]你知道 我就是女人的奴隶
[01:25.62]这地方从来不是表面上那样
[01:31.33]带我离开洛杉矶
[01:34.63]带我离开洛杉矶
[01:38.74]这个地方会成为我的葬身之地
[01:44.48]带我离开洛杉矶
[01:47.74]带我离开洛杉矶
[01:51.60]//
[01:53.04]我开着保时捷Spyder行驶在街头
[01:56.80]全身漆黑 座椅也是毒液一般的黑色
[02:00.11]像基努·李维斯一样飞速行驶
[02:03.42]镶钻十字架挂在我的脖子上
[02:06.49]像康斯坦丁一样保卫我的灵魂
[02:09.72]慢慢燃烧的雪茄 一点都不便宜
[02:13.02]假如你有和我一样的经历 你就会无法入睡
[02:16.36]我无法入睡
[02:17.78]我得到了想要的一切
[02:21.11]有钱 有车 坐在车里抬头就能看到星星
[02:24.54]拥有我想要的一切
[02:27.62]但没有你 我就一无所有
[02:31.15]给了你想要的一切
[02:34.21]给了你力量 给了你生命 给了你空间 让你闪耀发光
[02:37.64]给了你想要的一切
[02:40.92]但那一切你都不在乎
[02:44.63]这个地方
[02:46.93]这个地方
[02:47.70]从来不是表面上那样
[02:50.23]带我离开洛杉矶
[02:53.53]带我离开洛杉矶
[02:56.65]离开这里
[02:58.13]这个地方会成为我的葬身之地
[03:03.43]带我离开洛杉矶
[03:06.68]带我离开洛杉矶
[03:10.07]//
[03:16.66]//
[03:23.32]//
[03:33.25]//
[03:35.46]等一等
[03:51.94]她来到录音室
[03:56.43]这里没有别人
[03:58.57]她把门关上 然后上了锁
[04:01.51]为了我
[04:05.06]我们在录音室里亲热
[04:09.57]没人进来打扰
[04:11.85]我放下工作 她兴奋不已
[04:14.67]为了我
[04:18.15]洛杉矶的姑娘看起来都一样
[04:21.09]我分不清楚
[04:24.50]她们的脸都整容成一个模样
[04:27.65]我不评判什么
[04:30.92]她是个冷酷的女人 没有廉耻之心
[04:34.31]但她那方面真的很在行
[04:37.43]她的脖子上挂着Chrome Hearts的项链
[04:40.89]这些东西十分耀眼
[04:44.86]她做那种事情时 十分投入
[04:51.39]她无比疯狂 弄得大汗淋漓
[04:58.08]今晚她只属于我
[05:04.52]她全心全意服务我 直到她的男友联系她
[05:10.84]她来到录音室
[05:15.39]这里没有别人
[05:17.54]她把门关上 然后上了锁
[05:20.63]为了我
[05:23.93]我们在录音室里亲热
[05:28.11]没人进来打扰
[05:30.76]我放下工作 她兴奋不已
[05:33.66]为了我
[05:38.73]//
